title: Pixel XL first gen phone... Latest OS... Auto updates to OS... Screen goes DARK for no reason! Help!
content: The screen goes COMPLETELY DARK at random times during usage. Latest OS in use... Auto updates to OS... Phone gets a RESTART or POWER OFF every 24 hours. Plus a RESTART every time the BLACKOUT occurs. Have AVG AntiVirus, AVG Cleaner. Long-time Google Fi user. Thanks in advance for any help you may have. Beeker in Oklahoma
